definitions: 奇異[きい] (adj-na, adj-no, n) odd, strange, queer, peculiar
忌諱[きき] (n, vs) displeasure, offense, offence, disliking
貴意[きい] (n) your will, your wishes, your request
機位[きい] (n) position of aircraft
english: Large Materia needs high level Materia…  …zzzzzz….zzzzzzz…
japanese: 大っ[きい]マテリアはレベルが高～いマテリアが欲しいのかぁ……ぐー、ぐー

definitions: 蒸かす[ふかす] (v5s, vt) to steam (food)
吹かす[ふかす] (v5s, vt) to smoke (a cigarette),to behave as ...,to accelerate, to rev up
更かす[ふかす] (v5s, vt) to sit up late
english: What're you flappin' about? There's one right there!
japanese: [ふかし]こいてんじゃねぇよいるじゃねぇか、そこに

definitions: 実る[みのる] (v5r, vi) to bear fruit, to ripen
english: And what about those nut things?
japanese: それと、その[実っ]てのはどこにあるんだ？

definitions: 直ぐ[すぐ] (adj-na) immediately, at once, right away, directly,soon, before long, shortly,easily, readily, without difficulty,right (near), nearby, just (handy),honest, upright, frank, straightforward
過ぐ[すぐ] (v2g-k, vi) to pass through, to pass by, to go beyond,to pass (i.e. of time), to elapse,to have expired, to have ended, to be over,to exceed, to surpass, to be above
english: Mate it with a 'Wonderful Chocobo' you can catch right around here… And you'll get…
japanese: この[スグ]そばで取れるそれはいいチョコボとタマゴを生ませるとのぉ

definitions: 果て[はて] (n) the end, the extremity, the limit, the limits, the result
はて (n) dear me!, good gracious!,well, let me see, now,question mark
涯[はて] (n) horizon
english: You’ll need a certain type of nut. Just what type was it again...
japanese: 『実』が必要じゃ[はて]、なんの『実』じゃったかのぉ

definitions: 経る[へる] (v1, vi) to pass, to elapse, to go by,to pass through, to go through,to experience, to go through, to undergo
english: Over the course of many years, Mako energy will crystallize into Materia…
japanese: 長い年月を[経]て魔晄エネルギーがマテリアの結晶になっている……

definitions: 艦[かん] (n, n-suf) warship
潜行[せんこう] (n, vs) underwater navigation,going underground, going into hiding, travelling incognito, traveling incognito, travelling in disguise, traveling in disguise
english: press the [Cancel] button to get off
japanese: 【キャンセルボタン】降りる・[潜行]＆浮上

definitions: 浮上[ふじょう] (n, vs) surfacing, rising to the surface,emerging, leaping into prominence,rising (of rank)
english: press the [Cancel] button to get off
japanese: 【キャンセルボタン】降りる・潜行＆[浮上]

definitions: プレイヤー (n) player,prayer
english: Players can get on and off at bays like this one
japanese: このような入りえで[プレイヤー]の乗り降りができます。

definitions: 乗り降り[のりおり] (n, vs) getting on and off (a vehicle), boarding and alighting
english: Players can get on and off at bays like this one
japanese: このような入りえでプレイヤーの[乗り降り]ができます。

definitions: 迎え撃つ[むかえうつ] (v5t, vt) to ambush, to attack, to assault, to meet the enemy
english: What're you tryin to do? Break the Highwind? Let's fight on the ground
japanese: お、おい！ハイウインドを壊す気か？地上で[迎え撃と]うぜ！！

definitions: 勢い[いきおい] (adv) force, vigor, vigour, energy, spirit, life,influence, authority, power, might,impetus, momentum, course (of events),naturally, necessarily
english: What the hell was that! That came Buzzin past here like a powerhorse
japanese: な、なんだ今のは！？スゲエ[勢い]ではしかれたぜ！
